title: I tried Google Pixel 5 to Downgrade to Android 10, after sh flash-all.sh step. Device is not startin
content:
I tried Google Pixel 5 to Downgrade to Android 10, after sh flash-all.sh step. The device is not starting and even charging is not happening
nothing is coming on scree after pressing Power and Volume Rocker Down Button together for more than 20 seconds.

Device was in developer mode and OEM was unlocked from Developer Options
and below commands i ran on adb terminal

adb reboot bootloader
fastboot flashing unlock
sh flash-all.sh 
on last step device is got blank
